tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
context: Tooth Coloured Fillings,Teeth Whitening,Dental Cleaning,Dental Checkup (General),Scaling / Polishing,
review:
This was my first visit with Dr. Charmi Mehta and I wanted to get my enamel polishing and scaling done as I have to get the same done really often , also have my broken teeth reshaped and fixed because that teeth would stain really badly and I would feel really uncomfortable to smile as they where stained and not in proper shape.*** **** *** **** *** ****** ** *** **** ******** ****** ******* * **** **** **** ******* 
 
I have always been trying out new dentist to get my front 02 teeth fixed and I have changed 04 doctors as I didn’t see a significant change or difference in my teeth.

However after visiting Dento Kraft I am the happiest. 
And I must say I would continue going to get all my dental work from Dento Kraft and I would definitely recommend my fly and folks to get their dental work done from there.

Dr Charmi Mehta is really so hardworking, so good at her work.
Her work reflects in her results.
She is very particular and very good at her work. There is a lot of perfection in her work. It truly shows that she works with the intention of aiming for perfection and patient satisfaction.
Dento Kraft doctors are the best and really very hardworking, practical and honest.

Really affordable place to go with really good and experienced doctors. ****** ************* *** trustworthy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Fillings,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
My mom was facing issues in multiple teeth as there was gaping and was undergoing severe pain for past 4 months. So I did took her to multiple dentist but pain was recurring and was in search for a dentist who can cure the issue on a permanent basis. During my first appointment, I spoke to Dr. Charmi and she diagnosed the issue at a root level and explained the same in layman term and I got the confidence that she is the one who can cure it permanently. Root canal on multiple teeth and caping was done. The teeth looks all natural and now my mom is quite relaxed and happy with the treatment.
Thank You Dr. Charmi and team for providing the ******* treatment I could ask for and curing the issue at root level. Amazing and completely satisfied!!

I am strongly recommending Smile N Shine dental clinic and Dr. Mehta for the any dental related problem.
